text: Atahpara nisid'dha masa atibahita hale musarikadera hatya kara yekhane tadera pa'o, tadera bandi kara ebam abarodha kara. Ara pratyeka ghamtite tadera sandhane omt pete base thaka. Kintu yadi tara ta'oba kare, namaya kayema kare, yakata adaya kare, tabe tadera patha chere da'o. Niscaya allaha ati ksamasila, parama dayalu.
